description: Retry the execution of the pipeline.

parameters.name: PipelineExecutionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline execution.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the operation. An idempotent operation completes no more than once. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: ParallelismConfiguration
parameters.description: This configuration, if specified, overrides the parallelism configuration of the parent pipeline. The max number of steps that can be executed in parallel.

nested_params.name: MaxParallelExecutionSteps
nested_params.description: The max number of steps that can be executed in parallel.

nested_items.name: PipelineExecutionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline execution.
